properties.name: wechat.publicnum.oauth2.webViewAccessToken
properties.description:
根据 Code 获取网页授权 AccessToken
 https://api.weixin.qq.com/sns/oauth2/access_token?appid=APPID&secret=SECRET&code=CODE&grant_type=authorization_code.

properties.name: wechat.publicnum.oauth2.refreshToken
properties.description:
由于access_token拥有较短的有效期，当access_token超时后，可以使用refresh_token进行刷新，refresh_token有效期为30天，当refresh_token失效之后，需要用户重新授权
https://api.weixin.qq.com/sns/oauth2/refresh_token?appid=APPID&grant_type=refresh_token&refresh_token=REFRESH_TOKEN
.

properties.name: wechat.publicnum.oauth2.checkAccessToken
properties.description:
检验 AccessToken 是否有效
https://api.weixin.qq.com/sns/auth?access_token=ACCESS_TOKEN&openid=OPENID.

properties.name: wechat.publicnum.oauth2.code
properties.description: 用户同意授权，获取 Code.
